programme.title: O Príncipe das Flores é um demônio que se alimenta de corações tristes ou angustiados. Deslumbrado pela fragrância da flor, Inuyasha está envolvido em um sonho falso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O Espelho Demoníaco rouba a energia demoníaca de Tetsusaiga. Inuyasha contra-ataca, apesar de sofrer alguns golpes ferozes, mas todos os seus ataques apontados para o Espelho Demoníaco acabam sendo tomados por Kanna.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Jotaro demonstra suas habilidades com o Stand antes de começar uma partida de pôquer com D’Arby como aviso para que ninguém trapaceie.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Hol Horse chega ao aeroporto do Cairo com ordens para matar Jotaro e seus aliados. Dentro da mala, ele traz um novo e relutante parceiro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Hol Horse age de acordo com a profecia do livro, mas começa a questionar tudo quando Jotaro e o resto do grupo aparecem.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Avdol procura informações sobre a mansão de DIO no Cairo. Iggy enfrenta dois cães ameaçadores durante um passeio pela cidade.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O guardião do inferno Pet Shop – Parte 1

programme.title: Iggy foge para o rio após se ferir gravemente na luta contra Petto Shoppu, mas não dá sinais de que vai desistir.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O guardião do inferno Pet Shop – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo são recebidos na porta da mansão de DIO por um mordomo chamado D’Arby, que alega ser irmão mais novo de D’Arby, o apostador.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin perde a alma em um jogo de corrida contra D’Arby. Joseph escolhe um jogo que é a especialidade do mordomo e leva uma bronca de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mesmo estranhando as atitudes de Jotaro, D'Arby se mantém confiante graças ao Stand. Avdol e os outros entram na mansão.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O miasma do vazio, Cool Ice – Parte 1

programme.title: Polnareff e Iggy vão com tudo para destruir DIO, mas o terrível vampiro Cool Ice ataca os dois de surpresa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O miasma do vazio, Cool Ice – Parte 2

programme.title: Gravemente ferido, Iggy usa suas últimas forças para salvar Polnareff, que aproveita para ferir Cool Ice na cabeça.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O miasma do vazio, Cool Ice – Parte 3

programme.title: Polnareff finalmente enfrenta DIO, mas não consegue se aproximar. De longe, ele libera sua arma secreta para revelar o Stand de seu terrível oponente.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin quer revelar a identidade do Stand de DIO, e para isso usa seu próprio Stand em um ataque concentrado.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: DIO usa seu Stand e consegue parar o tempo, mas quando vai atacar, percebe que os dedos de Jotaro estão se mexendo. Quem vencerá esta batalha?
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: DIO contempla sua vitória. Enfurecido, Jotaro enfrenta seu inimigo em uma batalha final. O cenário? Um mundo em que o tempo está congelado.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O adeus da longa jornada, amigos

programme.title: Jotaro Kujo vai para a cidade de Morioh à procura de Josuke Higashikata. Ele vê alguém que acaba sendo Josuke se desculpando com uns valentões.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Stand de Angelo consegue entrar no corpo das pessoas. Apesar de Jotaro avisar para não consumirem nada, Josuke surpreende a mãe tomando um gole de café.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para proteger a cidade, Jotaro quer destruir o misterioso arco e flecha que despertou o poder do Stand de Angelo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para tentar salvar Koichi, Josuke vai à casa de Okuyasu Nijimura, mas é atacado por seu irmão, Keicho. Josuke propõe um acordo a Okuyasu, que está ferido.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Koichi decidem encontrar o arco e flecha e destruí-lo para impedir que haja mais vítimas. Eles o encontram no sótão, mas escutam um som estranho.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A caminho da escola de bicicleta, Koichi atropela um gato dentro de um saco. Um homem vê o acidente e chantageia Koichi, exigindo que ele pague pelo enterro do animal.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Koichi tentam descobrir se o colega de escola Toshikazu Hazamada está mesmo usando um Stand e encontram um boneco de madeira no armário dele.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A colega de escola Yukako Yamagishi confessa seu amor por Koichi. Ele fica muito feliz, mas ela acaba indo longe demais.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi tenta fugir, mas é impedido por Yukako e perde a esperança. Quando ela vai até um telefone público, algo inesperado acontece.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Okuyasu vão a um novo restaurante italiano que é meio esquisito. Okuyasu acha a água deliciosa, mas seu corpo tem uma reação estranha.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Red Hot Chili Pepper, que matou Keicho e roubou o arco e flecha, aparece diante de Josuke. Jotaro conta a Josuke e aos outros dois sobre um cara.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Seguindo as ordens de Jotaro, Josuke e Koichi ficam no porto e procuram Chili Pepper. O usuário do Stand aparece e acredita que pode vencê-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke reluta, mas tenta convencer o pai a voltar para casa. Joseph causa todo tipo de problema e diz que um usuário de Stand está por perto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi e Hazamada estão felizes de visitar a casa do famoso artista de mangá Rohan Kishibe, mas logo se assustam com ele.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Vamos para a casa do desenhista – Parte 1

programme.title: Rohan diz que Koichi o inspira a criar um mangá. Quando ele está prestes a aproveitar Koichi para sua arte, alguém bate à porta.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Vamos para a casa do desenhista – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro pede ajuda a Josuke para caçar um rato que consegue usar um Stand. Depois, eles encontram algo bizarro no canal de irrigação onde o rato foi visto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi e Rohan encontram algo estranho em um beco não identificado no mapa da cidade. Pressentindo ainda mais confusão, Rohan acha que é o ataque de um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Okuyasu veem pequenos Stands pegando moedas na rua. Eles vão atrás deles e conhecem um garoto chamado Shigechi. Josuke tem uma ideia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke, Okuyasu e Shigechi vão ao banco receber o prêmio da loteria. Lá, o banqueiro faz de tudo para provar que o bilhete premiado não é deles e Josuke entra em ação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yukako vai a uma estética para dar um trato no visual e atrair Koichi. O plano dá certo, mas o efeito dura só meia hora.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi sonha em ser Cinderella

programme.title: Valhalla - A Lenda de Thor, (2019, Adventure)
programme.desc: As crianças vikings Røskva e Tjalfe embarcam em uma aventura para Valhalla com os deuses Thor e Loki. A vida em Asgard, no entanto, acaba sendo ameaçada pelo temido lobo Fenrir e pelos arqui-inimigos bárbaros dos deuses.

programme.title: Mee-Shee: O Gigante das Aguas, (2007, Children)
programme.desc: A viagem para Disney foi cancelada. Mac e seu pai, Sean, vão a uma cidade com um lago. Eles encontrarão aventuras emocionantes que superam a Disney, com perseguições e bandidos. Uma história de amizade para toda a família.

programme.title: Clockstoppers: O Filme, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Zak Gibbs (Jesse Bradford, "Hackers") é um adolescente normal que consegue poderes extraordinários após encontrar um relógio misterioso que pode parar o tempo!

programme.title: Arn: O Cavaleiro Templário, (2007, Adventure)
programme.desc: Arn foi criado com o objetivo de ser um monge e um bravo guerreiro. Ao deixar sua terra, em meio à guerra entre cristãos e muçulmanos, ele conhece Cecília e se apaixona, porém Arn é enviado para lutar na Terra Santa como um cavaleiro templário.

programme.title: O Garoto Formiga 3, (2020, Children)
programme.desc: A Exofarm tem um novo CEO e quer controlar o mundo. Antboy, um menino de 12 anos, Pelle, que é mordido por uma formiga e desenvolve superpoderes, tenta impedi-la.

programme.title: Aventura Em Duas Rodas, (2019, Adventure)
programme.desc: Quando o maior castelo da Inglaterra é roubado por um notório chefe do crime, a última coisa que ele e sua gangue esperam é ter que enfrentar Sam e Jake, dois garotos em suas bicicletas.

programme.title: Pequenos Espiões 4, (2011, Children)
programme.desc: Marisa Cortez Wilson é casada com Wilbur, um repórter conhecido por desmascarar espiões, e com ele tem um bebê e duas crianças. O que o marido não sabe é que a esposa é uma ex-espiã, que decidiu largar a carreira para se dedicar à família.

programme.title: Os Piratas da Rua de Baixo, (2020, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: Quando uma família de piratas se muda para a chata Sandsborough, os vizinhos não ficam muito felizes. Michiel e seu novo amigo pirata Billy tentam fazer com que a família se misture, mas seu arquiinimigo chega à cidade e planeja roubar um tesouro.

programme.title: Arn: O Cavaleiro Templário, (2007, Adventure)
programme.desc: Arn foi criado com o objetivo de ser um monge e um bravo guerreiro. Ao deixar sua terra, em meio à guerra entre cristãos e muçulmanos, ele conhece Cecília e se apaixona, porém Arn é enviado para lutar na Terra Santa como um cavaleiro templário.

programme.title: Jack Hunter, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: O jovem arqueólogo Jack Hunter planejou apenas tirar uma foto de uma tabuinha cuneiforme da outrora insuperável metrópole mesopotmiana Ugarit, na atual Síria, mas é pego e tem que roubá-la de um museu particular na França.

programme.title: Batalha dos Impérios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legião de mil soldados no país e com o comandante do protetorado das Regiões Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: A Espada do Imortal, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Manji é um samurai altamente qualificado que torna-se amaldiçoado com a imortalidade após uma lendária batalha. Ele decide ajudar uma jovem que está movida pelo ódio e pela sede de vingança.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da máfia japonesa suspeita de ser vítima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: Massacre no Bairro Chinês, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie Chan faz o papel de um fugitivo do Japão que se torna um assassino para a máfia. O longa é focado na vida de imigrantes chineses que vivem no Japão.

programme.title: A Bucket of Blood, (1959, Horror)
programme.desc: A frustrated and talentless artist finds acclaim for a plaster covered dead cat that is mistaken as a skillful statuette. Soon the desire for more praise leads to an increasingly deadly series of works.

programme.title: Come Back, Little Sheba, (1952, Drama)
programme.desc: Based on William Inge's classic play, Come Back, Little Sheba is the stirring tale of a life-weary couple who rescue hope from the ruins of the past.

programme.title: Birdman of Alcatraz, (1962, Drama)
programme.desc: Burt Lancaster stars in the true story of killer Robert Stroud, who spent 43 years in solitary confinement at Alcatraz, and who educated himself, becoming a world renowned authority on birds. Thelma Ritter, Telly Savalas and Karl Malden co-star.

programme.title: Sweet Smell of Success, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: A columnist and a press agent tear into the maelstrom of midtown Manhattan's night creatures in a sinister game that involves money, power and ultimately survival.

programme.title: The Apartment, (1960, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon, Shirley MacLaine and Fred MacMurray are superb in this tale of love and ambition in the world of big business that went on to garner a Best Picture Oscar.

programme.title: Some Like It Hot, (1959, Screwball)
programme.desc: This hysterical comedy from director Billy Wilder finds Tony Curtis and Jack Lemmon masquerading as women in order to elude irate Chicago mobsters while befriending a beautiful singer (Marilyn Monroe).

programme.title: Ace in the Hole, (1951, Drama)
programme.desc: A cave collapse traps a man, and all eyes turn toward the tragedy, including those of Charles "Chuck" Tatum (Kirk Douglas), a washed-up newspaper reporter who sees the incident as a ticket back to his former days at the top of the journalism heap.

programme.title: Stalag 17, (1953, War)
programme.desc: Laced with comedy and cynicism, this is the story of a group of GIs who are thrown together in the notorious German prison camp Stalag 17, their suspicions about one being a spy and their efforts to escape.

programme.title: Bad Ass 3: Bad Asses on the Bayou, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Frank Vega (Danny Trejo)) and Bernie Pope (Danny Glover) return, this time to Louisiana in an attempt to find a kidnapped friend.

programme.title: Bloodsport, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Ninjitsu master Frank Dux journeys to Hong Kong to enter the Kumite, the Olympics of martial arts, and meets a beautiful American reporter. Before long he must face Chong-Li, a vicious Korean master of Tae Kwan Do, in a climactic fight to the finish.

programme.title: Close Range, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: A rogue soldier turned outlaw is thrust into a relentless fight with a corrupt sheriff, his obedient deputies, and a dangerous drug cartel in order to protect his family.

programme.title: Kandahar, (2023, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: After his mission is exposed, a CIA operative (Gerard Butler) and his Afghan translator must fight their way out of hostile territory to an extraction point in Kandahar.

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Mike Banning is framed for the attempted assassination of the President and must evade his own agency and the FBI as he tries to uncover the real threat.

programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An epic set against the breathtaking landscapes of ancient China, Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon combines the exhilarating martial arts choreography by Yuen Wo-Ping with the sensitivity and classical storytelling of an Ang Lee film.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol 1, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Bride wakes up after a long coma. The baby that she carried before entering the coma is gone. The only thing on her mind is to have revenge on the assassination team that betrayed her - a team she was once part of.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino completes the quest for revenge in KILL BILL; VOL. 1; as The Bride (Uma Thurman) crosses the final names off her death list.

programme.title: The Ruins, (2008, Horror)
programme.desc: "The Ruins" follows a group of friends who become entangled in a struggle for survival after visiting a remote archaeological dig in the Mexican jungle where they discover something deadly living among the ruins.

programme.title: 28 Days Later, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Spell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Marquis (Omari Hardwick) awakens from a plane crash, wounded, trapped and his family missing. Held by a mysterious elderly woman practicing Hoodoo, he tries to outwit and break free from her dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual.

programme.title: The Exorcism of Emily Rose, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: A thrilling horror film about a lawyer (Linney), who takes on a negligent homicide case involving a priest (Wilkinson) who performed an exorcism on a young girl.

programme.title: Urban Legend, (1998, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: When New England college student Natalie finds herself at the center of a series of sadistic murders seemingly inspired by urban legends, she resolves to find the truth about Pendleton's own legend. Rated: R

programme.title: Spell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Marquis (Omari Hardwick) awakens from a plane crash, wounded, trapped and his family missing. Held by a mysterious elderly woman practicing Hoodoo, he tries to outwit and break free from her dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths, an offbeat group of scary movie fans become the target of a masked killer in this smash-hit thriller from legendary director Wes Craven (A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET) that breathed new life into the horror genre.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: While away at college, Sidney Prescott thought she'd finally put the terror behind her...until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel in which no one is safe, or beyond suspicion.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Golden Wind
programme.desc: Amid the gritty beauty of Neapolis, the Joestar lineage lives on in Giorno Giovanna. After sidestepping long-term Joestar ally Koichi Hirose, Giorno must contend with two powerful Mafia gangsters, Leaky Eye Lucca and the enigmatic Bruno Bucciarati.

programme.title: Death Note: Dealings
programme.desc: Ryuk, the Shinigami, or god of death, who dropped the Death Note into the human world, warns Light that someone is on his trail.

programme.title: Death Note: Pursuit
programme.desc: Light, now known to the world as Kira, tests the Death Note to understand the scope of its powers by killing off six convicts in various ways.

programme.title: Death Note: Tactics
programme.desc: Soichiro Yagami demands to meet with L in person when he finds out that L has secretly brought FBI agents into Japan.

programme.title: Death Note: Unraveling
programme.desc: Light meets a woman at the Police Department with an urgent message for the Kira task force.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The Phantom Troupe finds out that Kurapika is the one who killed Uvogin.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Kurapika has captured Chrollo and negotiates an exchange for Gon and Killua with Pakunoda.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The auction for the game Greed Island finally begins.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua join the tryouts to become Greed Island players.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua enter the world of Greed Island in hopes of finding Ging, but all they find is a message left by him.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua head for Masadora, the City of Magic, in search of spell cards.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Biscuit announces to Gon and Killua that she will be their teacher.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua wrap up their training, while the Bomber appears before the players who had formed an alliance.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon continues to hone his special ability by using the Enhancer, Emitter and Transmuter aura types.
programme.sub-title: Evil Fist x And x Rock, Paper, Scissors

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Killua passes the Hunter Exam on his second attempt and returns to the game. Once reunited, Gon, Killua and Biscuit begin collecting cards steadily.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: In order to stop Genthru from clearing the game, Gon and Killua are asked to join an alliance.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and his friends meet the pirate boss Razor, but are overwhelmed by his power.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 3
programme.desc: Rohan finds himself possessed by Masazo Kinoto’s Stand, Cheap Trap, who tells the manga artist to burn the photos he took of the people in Morioh. Meanwhile, Josuke and Yuya encounter the Stand user responsible for Koichi’s disappearance.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 4
programme.desc: Rohan calls over Koichi to help him fight off Cheap Trap, which has attached itself onto Rohan’s back. Unfortunately, Koichi thinks Rohan is pulling a prank on him and leaves.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Bites the Dust, Part 1
programme.desc: Kosaku Kawajiri is forced to kill Hayato after the boy threatens to expose him as a killer. To make matter worse, Kosaku learns from his father, Yoshihiro, that Rohan and the others are coming to investigate the Kawajiri family shortly.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Bites the Dust, Part 2
programme.desc: Yoshikage Kira gains a new ability called Bites the Dust, a bomb that automatically kills anyone who tries to discover Kira’s identity through Hayato. Realizing that the only people who could stop Kira are ones with similar powers.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Shining D (Diamond) is Unbreakable, Part 1
programme.desc: Hayato’s attempt to kill Kira using Stray Cat’s air bullet ends in failure. Kira realizes that letting Hayato repeat the same morning is becoming a risk, so he decides to undo Bites the Dust after he sees through Rohan’s death.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Shining D (Diamond) is Unbreakable, Part 2
programme.desc: Josuke and Hayato hide inside a nearby residence to escape from Deadly Queen and Stray Cat’s attack. But to their horror, Kira is somehow able to close in on them from outside the house.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Goodbye, Morioh – The Heart of Gold
programme.desc: Josuke and his friends have finally cornered Yoshikage Kira. Refusing to give up, Kira tries to activate Bites the Dust one more time to escape his desperate situation. Can Josuke and the others stop Kira in time to save the future of Morioh?
programme.sub-title: Goodbye, Morioh – The Heart of Gold

programme.title: Coming to America, (1988, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: As the vampire Maximillian, the popular star is the most diabolical, dashing and definitely undead dude in the ‘hood’.

programme.title: The Golden Child, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: As ‘The Chosen One’, Murphy’s on a madcap mission to save The Golden Child, a youth with mystical powers who’s been abducted by an evil cult.

programme.title: Coming to America, (1988, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Join EDDIE MURPHY on an unforgettable comic quest to the New World. As an African Prince, it's time for him to find a princess. The mission leads him and his most loyal friend (ARSENIO HALL) to New York. Watch Murphy and Hall in classic cameo roles!

programme.title: Black Dynamite, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: An all-star cast led by Michael Jai White is featured in this 1970s-style blaxploitation action film about the legendary super crime fighter "Black Dynamite."

programme.title: Lila & Eve, (2015, Thriller)

programme.title: Hinata is kidnapped by Suzumebachi and others from the Kamizuru Clan.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Kiba and Shino are pursued and find themselves cornered in the hive of a queen bee.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: While training in the Hidden Leaf Village, Naruto rescues three men from the rapids who have come to request a mission.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Kurosuki gang captures Rokusuke, and Raiga tells him that he will hold a funeral for him!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Raiga and Ranmaru use their Hidden Mist Jutsu to conceal themselves in Katabami Gold Mine, where even Neji’s Byakugan cannot detect them.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Kurosuki Family is dispersed, and peace returns to Katabami Gold Mine.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Raiga comes back to life, only to see Ranmaru lying deathly still on the ground.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: 8 Heads in a Duffel Bag, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: All gangster Tommy Spinelli wants to do is deliver his carry-on duffel bag to his boss. Unfortunately, the bag is switched with a Mexican-bound medical student...who has no idea that the bag contains the severed heads of eight Los Angeles gangsters!

programme.title: MAFIA, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: In the 1970s, a fierce crime boss (Ving Rhames) wreaks havoc on the streets. Detective Womack (Pam Grier) decides to put an end to this organized crime – even if it means breaking the law.

programme.title: King of the Avenue, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: An ambitious drug dealer sells his soul to the devil to become the city's biggest drug boss, knowing that when Satan comes to collect, he'll have to outwit a most evil force.

programme.title: Stand Up Guys, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Oscar winners Al Pacino, Christopher Walken, and Alan Arkin star in this action-comedy about retired gangsters who reunite for one last epic night.

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Thieves attempt a massive heist against the U.S. Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its Mint facilities.

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: After a seemingly perfectly planned robbery goes awry, a group of criminals begin to suspect there is a traitor in the ranks, and back at their headquarters try to suss out the culprit.

programme.title: Heist, (2001, Heist Films)
programme.desc: A jewel thief's nephew is sent along on a heist to ensure a longtime partner in crime stays honest about the division of the loot.

programme.title: 88 Minutes, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: A college professor, who moonlights as a forensic psychiatrist for the FBI, receives a death threat that says he has only 88 minutes to live. To save his life, he must use all his skills and training to narrow down the possible suspects.

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: After a seemingly perfectly planned robbery goes awry, a group of criminals begin to suspect there is a traitor in the ranks, and back at their headquarters try to suss out the culprit.

programme.title: 12 Angry Men, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: Eleven jurors are convinced that the defendant is guilty of murder. The twelfth has no doubt of his innocence. How can this one man steer the others toward the same conclusion? Henry Fonda and Lee J. Cobb lead the all-star cast in this classic!

programme.title: Harold and Maude, (1971, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A classic cult film that features one of the screen's most unlikely pairs. It will defy everything you've ever seen or known about screen lovers.

programme.title: Boyhood, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Filmed over twelve years with the same cast, Richard Linklater's acclaimed smash hit is a groundbreaking celebration of life. Stars Ethan Hawke and Patricia Arquette.

programme.title: Bernie, (2012, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician (Jack Black, "School of Rock") strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, who soon becomes controlling.

programme.title: Nacho Libre, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black is more hilarious than ever as Ignacio, a monastery cook who feeds orphan children by day and by night transforms himself into Nacho Libre, a notorious Luchador in stretchy pants.

programme.title: Hot Rod, (2007, Screwball)
programme.desc: A comedy about a stunt man who’s never successfully landed a jump without wiping out and his attempt to master the biggest stunt of his life.

programme.title: Road Trip, (2000, Screwball)
programme.desc: Four friends take off on an 1800 mile road trip to retrieve an illicit tape mistakenly mailed to a girl friend.

programme.title: Goon, (2012, Comedy)
programme.desc: Not content with his job as a bouncer, Doug Glatt (Seann William Scott) dreams of a more rewarding job and gaining his parents’ respect.

programme.title: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein, (1994, Frankenstein)
programme.desc: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Ichabod Crane, an investigator determined to stop the murderous Headless Horseman.

programme.title: Eye of the Beholder, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A private eye shadows a female serial killer of men all over the U.S. without her knowing as he, strangely enough, occasionally acts as her guardian angel.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein, (1994, Frankenstein)
programme.desc: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Cliffhanger, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: This gripping action-adventure tale features Sylvester Stallone as a member of the Rocky Mountain Rescue Team, still grieving over his inability to prevent a friend from falling to her death.

programme.title: The Bad News Bears, (1976, Comedy)
programme.desc: A major surprise as one of 1976's top-grossing films. THE BAD NEWS BEARS is a movie about children that is refreshing, utterly believable, and quite cleverly funny.

programme.title: Bad News Bears in Breaking Training, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story picks up the Bears career a year after their infamous second-place finish in the North Valley League. Faced with a chance to play the Houston Toros for a shot at the Japanese champs, they devise a way to get Texas to play at the famed Astrodome.

programme.title: Bad News Bears Go To Japan, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Caught in a clash of cultures and ready to wreak more havoc on Japan than Godzilla, the Bad News Bears are back this time the Bears are spirited off to Tokyo by a slick and sleazy con artist who sees in the team a perfect peg for a get-rich-quick scheme.

programme.title: Pink Panther Strikes Again, (1976, Comedy)
programme.desc: Chief Inspector Dreyfus (Herbert Lom) is finally driven mad by Inspector Clouseau's (Peter Sellers) incompetence and commandeers a doomsday device along with a demand for Clouseau’s death. Are 26 hired assassins a match for Clouseau's dumb luck?

programme.title: The End, (1978, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: When Sonny (Burt Reynolds) is diagnosed with a fatal disease, he swallows a bottle of pills to end it all! Instead, he ends up in a loony bin beside the demented Marlon (Dom DeLuise) who is eager to help Sonny succeed...one madcap attempt at a time!

programme.title: Foul Play, (1978, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Beware of the Dwarf, whispers the hitchhiker to the beautiful librarian as he dies through a screening of This Gun Is Mine. Suddenly, Hawn is propelled into a world of wild chases and deadly encounters with an assortment of weird characters.

programme.title: The Conversation, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Coppola's provoking mystery-drama in which Harry Caul, expert surveillance man, hears something disturbing in his recording of a young couple in a park. He worries about what the tape may be used for and becomes involved in a maze of secrecy and murder.

programme.title: 3 Days of the Condor, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: A mild-mannered CIA researcher, paid to read books, returns from lunch to find all of his co-workers assassinated. "Condor" must find out who did this and get in from the cold before the hitmen get him.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 1 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 2 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 3 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 4 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 1

programme.title: Money troubles force Zoro to tangle with Dick the Bandit and his treacherous gang of thugs. These gun-toting outlaws are terrorizing a peaceful village, and the Straw Hat swordsman aims to stop their reign of terror!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fabled Pirate Hunter! Zoro, The Wandering Swordsman

programme.title: A barrage of Marine cannon balls forces the Straw Hats to seek refuge on an uncharted island. Once ashore, the crew encounters a strange old man living amongst a herd of goats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zenny Of The Island Of Goats And The Pirate Ship In The Mountains!

programme.title: Old man Zenny made a fortune lending money to scallywags, but he always dreamed of becoming a pirate himself. When the marines set out to trap the Straw Hats, the wily hermit may finally get his wish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: How's Tricks? The Designs of Zenny the Moneylender!

programme.title: Zenny gets more than he bargained for when he embarks on his maiden pirate voyage. The Straw Hats may have made a friend for life, but what are they gonna do about those pesky marines?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Whereabouts of the Island Treasure! Attack of the Zenny Pirates!

programme.title: The Straw Hats stop for supplies at a harbor town plagued by a mayor who taxes anything and everything. Over lunch, Luffy and Nico befriend a kooky scientist who’s obsessed with the Rainbow Mist.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Legend Of The Rainbow Mist! Old Man Henzo Of Luluka Island

programme.title: Luffy, Usopp, Nico, and Zoro get trapped in the Rainbow Mist along with Henzo. The aging scientist is looking for answers, the Straw Hats want treasure, and the ghosts who haunt the mist want them all to leave!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Residents of the Land of Eternity! The Pumpkin Pirates

programme.title: Luffy and his crew search for a way out of Ape’s Concert, but the Rainbow Mist is an inescapable maze of madness. Back on shore, Nami, Chopper, and Sanji face a lifetime of hard labor for failing to pay their taxes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Thoughts of Home! The Pirate Graveyard of No Escape!

programme.title: Nami enters the mist on a mission to save her mates – and maybe hunt for treasure while she’s at it. The local mayor wants her dead, but the Straw Hats are being protected by a mysterious marine.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Inevitable Melee! Wetton's Schemes and the Rainbow Tower

programme.title: The showdown with Mayor Wetton builds towards an explosive finale as the Straw Hats scramble to escape the Rainbow Mist – or be trapped inside forever.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: And So, the Legend Begins! To the Other Side of the Rainbow

programme.title: The Straw Hats are nearly crushed by the falling wreckage of a ship that’s over 200 years old. Could rumors of a floating island in the sky be true? Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji go scuba diving to find out!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Caught log! The king of salvagers, Masira!

programme.title: Still searching for a route to the island in the sky, the Straw Hats chart a course for Jaya. Meanwhile, Fire-Fist Ace crashes a party aboard a vessel helmed by Buggy the Pirate!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Monsters Appear! Don't Mess with The White Beard Pirates!

programme.title: The Straw Hats drop anchor at a town overrun by scallywags, so Nami makes the boys swear to stay out of trouble. But when the Bellamy Pirates come looking for a fight, Luffy may have to break his promise!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Quit Dreaming! Mock Town, The Town Of Ridicule!

programme.title: Nico’s handy work unearths a solitary dreamer who may know the way to Sky Island. All Luffy and his crew have to do is survive the sonic onslaught of simian salvagers seeking to sink the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Distinguished Pirates! A Man Who Talks Of Dreams And The King Of Undersea Search!

programme.title: Luffy and his mates reach the home of Mont Blanc Cricket: the man with the key to reaching Sky Island. There’s just one tiny problem – he comes from a long line of legendary liars.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Montblanc Cricket agrees to help the Straw Hats reach Sky Island, but first they must venture deep into the darkest depths of a spider-infested forest to capture a mysterious bird with a keen sense of direction.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Steer for the Clouds! Capture the South bird!!

programme.title: While the Straw Hats battle creepy-crawly forest creatures on their quest to capture a South Bird, Mont Blanc and his monkey minions are brutally attacked by the Bellamy Pirates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dreams Don't Come True?! Bellamy Versus the Saruyama Alliance!

programme.title: Luffy turned the other cheek during his first encounter with Bellamy, but now he’s out to settle the score for old man Mont Blanc. Meanwhile, a fearsome pirate crew takes aim at the Straw Hats, eager to earn a bad reputation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: 100 Million Man! World's Greatest Power and Pirate Black Beard!

programme.title: Thanks to some modifications to the Going Merry, the Straw Hats are on their way to that island in the sky! But with the Blackbeard Pirates in hot pursuit, navigating the vertical currents will be anything but easy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Take to the Sky! Ride the Knockup Stream!

programme.title: Reaching the sea of clouds proves easier than surviving in it when giant sea creatures attack the Going Merry, Usopp nearly drowns in a cloud, and a strange sky knight issues the Straw Hats a warning!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sail the white sea! The sky knight and the gate in the clouds!

programme.title: After hitching a ride on a speedy shrimp, the Straw Hats reach the land of Skypiea! The intrepid pirates have much to learn about their new surroundings, but a beautiful angel makes a perfect tour guide.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Godland, skypiea! Angels on a beach of clouds!

programme.title: Nami’s eagerness to explore the forbidden realm of Upper Yard brings her face to face with the wrath of god, and the Straw Hats incur Heaven’s Judgment for failing to pay their immigration fees!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The forbidden sacred ground! The island where god lives and heaven's judgement!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are no strangers to living on the wrong side of the law, but unpaid immigration fees and Nami’s assault of a White Beret earns Luffy’s crew a sentence of death by cloud drifting!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Already criminals?! Skypiea's upholder of the law!

programme.title: Nami, Zoro, Chopper, and Robin are trapped aboard the Going Merry when it’s commandeered by a monstrous lobster! To rescue his crew, Luffy must venture onto the sacred grounds of Upper Yard!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Is escape possible?! God's challenge is set in motion!

programme.title: Conis helps Luffy and his mates launch their rescue mission, but the rubber-man senses something amiss. When he presses her for answers, a vengeful god takes a shot at the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A trap on lovely street! The almighty eneru!

programme.title: Zoro dukes it out with a hungry Skyshark in the shadow of the Sacrificial Alter. On the other side of Upper Yard, Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp try to survive their visit to an island that wants them dead!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Onward, crow! To the sacrifical altar!

programme.title: Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp tangle with Satori and his exploding, snake-filled Surprise Clouds. The sky priest may look like a dancing dango, but the impact of his mantra leaves the pirates bloodied and boatless.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: 10% survival rate! Satori, the mantra master!

programme.title: Usopp and Sanji try to regain control of the Crow, and Luffy stirs up a brutal barrage of bursting balls when he attacks Satori. Meanwhile, Chopper whistles for the Sky Knight to avoid becoming a sacrificial reindeer!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The ordeal of spheres! Desperate struggle in the lost forest!

programme.title: Chopper fights bravely to stop Shura from incinerating the Going Merry, but the little reindeer is no match for a sky priest. Gan Fall is on his way, but will the dispossessed deity arrive in time?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chopper in danger! Former god vs. Priest shura!

programme.title: When Gan Fall is badly burned during his battle with Shura, Chopper musters the courage for a death-defying leap of faith. Elsewhere, Luffy may have finally discovered a way to defeat Satori!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Profound mystery! Ordeal of string and ordeal of love?!

programme.title: The Shandorians prepare for an all-out attack on their priestly adversaries, Chopper meets the mysterious creatures that saved his life, and Nami makes an astonishing discovery about the origins of Upper Yard.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Light the fire of shandora! Wyper, the warrior!

programme.title: While the Shandorians continue their battle for control of Upper Yard, the Straw Hats celebrate their happy reunion by swapping stories over a campfire and feasting on barbequed Skyshark!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Jaya, city of gold in the sky! Head for god's shrine!

programme.title: Laki’s pursuit of precious Vearth causes one of her Shandorian comrades to be injured during the battle with Ohm. As night falls on Upper Yard, the Straw Hats dream of gold while dancing with wolves!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Festival on the night before gold-hunting! Feelings for vearth!

programme.title: The electrifying deity of Skypiea, God Eneru, grants his priests unlimited power in their hunt for the Straw Hats. Usopp has a plan to get the mysteriously-repaired Going Merry back in the water, but it involves using Chopper as bait!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter god eneru!! Farewell to the survivors!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "The Secret Of Mamo"
programme.desc: The world's most wanted master thief, Lupin III is dead! Despite a coroner's report, Interpol Inspector Zenigata is skeptical and discovers that Lupin is actually alive and well and stealing! But who had set up Lupin's death and why?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: The Hida Speedway has been completed and Lupin is looking to take top prize at the first race. The race is actually a trap designed by the Scorpion Gang who are intent on killing Lupin and eliminating all criminal competition.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko has stolen something from a man named Pycal, and he wants it back. Pycal is a magician who is able to shoot flames from his hands, walk on air, and deflect bullets with ease. Lupin goes up against Pycal in hopes of saving Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: The Man They Called a Magician

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A boat collision ruins Lupin and Fujiko's quiet boating expedition. They discover a woman named Linda in the other boat just as gunmen on a larger boat attack them.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko successfully pull off a heist; that is until Zenigata manages to shoot Lupin with a tranquilizer dart. Zenigata hauls Lupin off to jail. Despite Fujiko's best efforts, she cannot break Lupin out of prison.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: With the help of some quick gunplay by his partner Jigen, Lupin takes on the world in elaborate heists, classic car chases, and nasty explosions. Fujiko, a buxom redhead with a penchant for betrayal, always gets tangled up in Lupin's capers.
programme.sub-title: The Coming of Goemon the Thirteenth

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: One rainy afternoon, a man seeks Lupin's help on behalf of a young woman. The woman is actually Fujiko, who is after a diamond known as "The Star of Killamanjaro". The diamond was implanted into the chest of a mob boss.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Three scrolls contain the secret of creating a blade like the Zantetsuken. Lupin wants to steal them as a matter of family pride because his grandfather, Arsene Lupin, stole them back in the 19th century.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Napoleon once owned a deck of fortune-telling cards that are now in the hands of a millionaire known as Mr. Gold. Lupin plans to steal them during Mr. Gold's birthday party, and Zenigata plans to stop him. Lupin succeeds in stealing the mysterious cards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang aim to steal the blueprints for a new computer. In their way is a man skilled with the machinegun and his hit-man partner named Poon, who used to be Fujiko's partner in the past.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is posing as Lupin and blowing up bridges, causing a lot of damage and injuries. Lupin and Jigen discover that the bomber is trying to force an armored car to travel along a route of his choosing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Mamo Kyosuke claims that Lupin will disappear from the world in four days. He claims that he is a time traveler from 2874 seeking revenge. Apparently, Lupin XIII destroyed the Mamo clan on March 2874.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are both after the legendary Eye of the Nile emerald. It is going to be a wedding gift presented at a wedding being held on a yacht.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Zenigata has been invited to an international police convention in Europe; his chief wants him to go, but Zenigata does not want to since Lupin has declared that he will steal a gold bust within the next three days.
programme.sub-title: Let's Catch Lupin and Go to Europe

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko goads Lupin into stealing a large shipment of diamonds. Lupin takes the task despite Jigen's protest that Fujiko is playing them for fools. Of course, Jigen is right.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko invites Lupin and the gang to a famous nightclub owned by the sexy Hoshikage Rinko. Only Goemon refuses. This was a wise move as Rinko places timebombs on Fujiko, Jigen, and Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Smith is an art thief that is selling stolen paintings under the guise of a beauty contest. Lupin decides he wants in on the action as well, promising to steal away the treasured paintings.
programme.sub-title: Keep an Eye On the Beauty Contest

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Inspector Ganimard III is the grandson of Lupin I's archnemesis. He has come to Japan as the head of security for the 1972 France Fair but also intends to restore his family's honor by arresting Lupin III.
programme.sub-title: Which of the Third Generation Will Win!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is committing thefts under Lupin's name. Lupin follows the imposters back to their island hideout. He has apparently stumbled into a whole island of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Rie is being held captive though she does not realize it. She believes the man holding her is a friend of her father, Ken Makita. Lupin shows up to rescue her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Gordon, an FBI computer specialist, is in Japan to operate a computer capable of predicting crimes and determining how to stop them. The Metropolitan Police Department hopes that this will finally help them capture Lupin.
programme.sub-title: The First Move Wins Computer Operation!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A disputed horde of recently discovered ancient gold coins draws the attention of Lupin and company. As the ownership of the coins is disputed, Lupin decides to settle the matter on his own by stealing them from the Dai Nippon Bank.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Bye Bye, Lady Liberty
programme.desc: Foiled repeatedly by the predictions of Interpol's supercomputer, professional looter Lupin III has settled down. A sinister secret organization and a young computer genius are thrown into the mix. And whose side is the buxom Fujiko on this time?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away… and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: Season of the Witch, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A 14th-century Crusader returns to a homeland devastated by the Black Plague. A beleaguered church commands the knight to transport an accused witch to a remote abbey, where monks will perform a ritual in hopes of ending the pestilence.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Nothing can prepare you for the mind-blowing mayhem that is Overlord. Mega producer J.J. Abrams creates an insanely twisted thrill ride about a team of American troops who come face-to-face with Nazi super-soldiers unlike the world has ever seen.

programme.title: Gamer, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Set in a future world where humans can control other humans in mass-scale, multi-player online gaming environments, a star player (Butler) from a game called 'Slayers' looks to regain his independence while taking down the game's mastermind (Hall).

programme.title: Legion, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When God loses faith in mankind, he sends his Legion of angels to wipe out the human race for the second time. Man's only hope lies in a group of misfits holed up in a desert diner.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Cloverfield, (2007, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Five young New Yorkers face a life or death struggle in order to escape from the city when a monster the size of a skyscraper suddenly appears.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Zorro, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: In the New World, a new Spanish governor finds the province of Nueva Aragón under the iron fist of the corrupt Colonel Huerta and vows to bring justice under the guise of a masked avenger.

programme.title: Dakota, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: In 1871 Dakota, two crooked businessmen oppose the local wheat farmers and the railroad development, in order to control the town of Fargo.

programme.title: Flame Of Barbary Coast, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: A cowboy competes with a gambling tycoon on the Barbary Coast for the hand of a beautiful dance-hall queen.

programme.title: The Dark Command, (1940, Drama)
programme.desc: A Civil War tale based on the exploits of the notorious outlaw William Quantrill. A courageous sheriff stands up to Quantrill and his band of guerrillas pillaging the countryside in Civil War-torn Kansas, and stops the raids.

programme.title: The Kentuckian, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Eli Wakefield (Burt Lancaster) and his son are Kentucky adventurers longing for life on the Texas frontier. They learn, however, that their greatest challenge lies not in the uncharted wilderness, but in the people they meet along the way.

programme.title: The Rainmaker, (1965, Drama)
programme.desc: Katharine Hepburn garnered an Oscar nomination as the "plain yet magnetically beautiful" tomboy rancher, with Burt Lancaster brilliantly cast in the role of the smooth-talking con man.

programme.title: Vera Cruz, (1954, Drama)
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the army…and each other!

programme.title: The Tin Star, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: Ben Owens, a greenhorn sheriff who hasn’t worn his badge long... and won’t live to wear it much longer unless he gets some savvy help.

programme.title: Man of the West, (1958, Drama)
programme.desc: Screen legend Gary Cooper demonstrates why he will always be remembered as one of the most authentic stars of the screen. Capable yet vulnerable, Cooper's portrayal of a former outlaw whose past returns to haunt him ranks among his very best.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel: Witch Hunters, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for a twisted take on the classic tale as Hansel and Gretel have turned pro, coping with the trauma of their childhood captivity by slaying witches for hire.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days, (2010, Horror)
programme.desc: Almost a year has passed since Barrow, Alaska’s population was decimated by vampires. Stella, mourning her husband’s murder, has been travelling the world trying to convince others that vampires exist.

programme.title: Skinwalkers, (2007, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A 12-year-old boy and his mother become the targets of two warring werewolf packs, each with different intentions and motives.

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel: Witch Hunters, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for a twisted take on the classic tale as Hansel and Gretel have turned pro, coping with the trauma of their childhood captivity by slaying witches for hire.

programme.title: 28 Days Later, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Catacombs, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: Horror unfolds when a naïve American makes her first trip to Paris and is invited to an underground rave party in the city's catacombs.

programme.title: Possuída
programme.desc: Depois de descobrir que sua irmã mais velha foi mordida por um lobisomem, a adolescente Brigitte embarca em uma missão desesperada para encontrar uma maneira de reverter o feitiço e salvá-la antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Psicopata Americano II
programme.desc: A história se passa quase 15 anos após os acontecimentos de Psicopata Americano, acompanhando a única sobrevivente de Patrick Bateman. Ela se torna assistente de um professor e começa a desenvolver obsessões assassinas, destruindo quem cruzar seu caminho.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais
programme.desc: Um sádico serial killer sequestra aqueles que são moralmente rebeldes e os força a fazer escolhas impossíveis em um jogo de sobrevivência assustador.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 2
programme.desc: Jigsaw está de volta. O gênio brilhante e perturbado retorna para outra rodada de jogos mortais horripilantes.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 5
programme.desc: No quinto capítulo da franquia Jogos Mortais, o Detetive Hoffman parece ser a última pessoa viva a continuar o legado do Jigsaw. Mas quando o seu segredo é ameaçado, Hoffman precisa ir à caça para eliminar todos os assuntos inacabados.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 6
programme.desc: O Agente Especial Strahm está morto, e o Detetive Hoffman emergiu como sucessor indiscutível do legado do Jigsaw. Porém, quando o FBI se aproxima de Hoffman, ele é forçado a iniciar o jogo, e o grande esquema do Jigsaw é finalmente compreendido.

programme.title: Fera Da Neve
programme.desc: Uma equipe de pesquisa na natureza selvagem se depara com um monstro aterrorizante.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contágio
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalação após a liberação de uma bactéria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituição psiquiátrica encontra um velho tubo de vácuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactérias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: Maldita Aranha Assassina
programme.desc: A cidade de Los Angeles tem um grande problema pela frente. Uma aranha gigante acaba de escapar de um laboratório e está aterrorizando os moradores da cidade.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 6 Cabeças
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivência quando um tubarão de 6 cabeças começa a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: O Dia Da Múmia
programme.desc: O arqueólogo Jack Wells explora a tumba do rei Neferu na esperança de recuperar um diamante lendário quando a múmia do rei retornar dos mortos em busca de vítimas humanas.

programme.title: A Invasão Zumbi
programme.desc: Quando zumbis tomam conta de São Francisco, um grupo desesperado sobrevive trancando-se dentro da prisão de Alcatraz. Quando os mortos-vivos violam a ilha, nossos heróis são forçados a retornar ao continente invadido pelos mortos-vivos.

programme.title: O Monstro dentro de você
programme.desc: Depois de uma noite de festa Lou se levanta com sintomas desagradáveis que indicam que algo está errado. Seu corpo muda pouco a pouco de uma maneira estranha, há manchas em sua pele e ele tem visões que a impedem de distinguir a realidade da ficção.

programme.title: As Duas Faces de um Crime
programme.desc: Um suspense de tribunal sobre um famoso advogado (Richard Gere) que assume o caso aparentemente impossível de um coroinha (Edward Norton) acusado de matar um padre católico.

programme.title: Três Ladrões e Um Bebê
programme.desc: Para o compulsivo jogador de Slipper (Jackie Chan), existe apenas uma coisa mais aterrorizante do que os credores - o som do choro de um bebê. Mas e se um bebê se transforma-se no salvador de suas dívidas?

programme.title: Era uma vez na China
programme.desc: No fim do século 19, Wong Fei-Hung enfrenta o saque estrangeiro na China. Com a violência crescendo, até tia Yee questiona os ideais ocidentais diante do poder do Kung Fu.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 3
programme.desc: Ao lado de sua nova aprendiz Amanda,o manipulador por trás dos jogos cruéis e complexos, que aterrorizaram uma comunidade e chocaram a polícia, mais uma vez escapa de ser capturado e desaparece.

programme.title: O Guardião
programme.desc: Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo México para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresário. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgatá-la e protegê-la.

programme.title: Alvo Duplo
programme.desc: Dois caras durões e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vão unir forças para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa não será nada fácil e muito sangue vai rolar.

programme.title: Pilotos de Elite
programme.desc: Depois de se formarem na academia de aeronáutica, um grupo de pilotos ousados entram para a equipe de elite militar chinesa, onde a rivalidade poderá colocar tudo a perder quando uma ameaça terrorista e uma conspiração ameaçam o país.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Blitz é um serial killer de Londres que está matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polícia duro, inflexível e politicamente incorreto, terão a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata.

programme.title: Código de Honra
programme.desc: Um ex-coronel das forças especiais se torna um vigilante que mata criminosos, enquanto um ex-colega quer detê-lo.

programme.title: Wasabi
programme.desc: Um durão detetive francês, chamado ao Japão para o funeral da esposa que o deixou há muito tempo atrás, descobre que tem uma filha adolescente cuja vida corre perigo, estando na mira da Yakuza.

programme.title: Vice: A Máquina
programme.desc: Julian Michaels é um consagrado designer cuja obra maior é Vice, um resort onde as pessoas podem fazer absolutamente tudo o que desejar, sem se ater a leis ou regras, já que apenas convive com robôs travestidos de humanos.

programme.title: Zona Mortal
programme.desc: Um criminoso consegue fugir de paraquedas quando é transportado em um avião da polícia. Por causa disso, o agente Pete Nessip que o acompanhava é suspenso, mas decide procurar o preso fugitivo por conta própria.

programme.title: Contato Zero
programme.desc: Produzido em dezessete países diferentes e totalmente virtual durante a pandemia global de 2020.

programme.title: Busca Alucinante
programme.desc: Mary leva seu namorado Kevin para uma operação de rotina. Quando a jovem percebe que deixou seu Black Berry em casa com informações importantes para seu trabalho, ela vai buscá-lo. Voltando ao hospital, Kevin se foi.

programme.title: A Última Vítima
programme.desc: Depois que uma jovem testemunha um ataque da máfia, um assassino experiente e seu parceiro psicótico devem localizá-la antes que ela os entregue, mas ela se revela a vítima mais difícil de matar.

programme.title: Submundo
programme.desc: Quando os detetives da cidade grande se recusam a continuar investigando o assassinato do seu irmão mais novo cometido pela própria gangue, o xerife de uma cidade pequena se disfarça para encontrar o assassino do irmão e vingar a sua morte.

programme.title: Tempo Esgotado
programme.desc: À estação de L.A., o contador Gene mergulha num pesadelo. Dois estranhos separam Watson de sua filha, jogam uma arma na mão dele e propõe uma diabólica troca: matar uma importante candidata político ou nunca mais rever sua filha. A contagem começa...

programme.title: Caçada Implacável
programme.desc: Quando um grupo de guerreiros fugitivos pega Rhodes e sua filha como refém, um desejo imenso de vingança vai dominar seu território. E ele não vai ter dó de quem ousar cruzar seu caminho.

programme.title: Na Mira dos Assassinos
programme.desc: Uma gangue de ladrões fugindo após roubar um banco corre para um acampamento familiar. Aproveitando a ocasião, os criminosos vão esconder o dinheiro roubado no carro enquanto descansam.

programme.title: Depois do Apocalipse
programme.desc: Em uma Era Pós-Apocalíptica, Juliet é uma garota forte e destemida que luta todos os dias para conseguir água, comida e abrigo em uma região devastada e perigosa.

programme.title: Regressão
programme.desc: Aos 16 anos de idade, Anna é filha de um dos casais mais ricos dos Estados Unidos. Esta garota inteligente e manipuladora acabou de passar por um grande trauma relacionado à sua família. Para investigar o caso, o perito John é convocado.

programme.title: Skyline - A Invasão
programme.desc: Luzes estranhas descem sobre a cidade de Los Angeles, atraindo as pessoas para fora como mariposas para uma chama onde uma força extraterrestre ameaça engolir toda a população humana da face da Terra.

programme.title: Piranha 2
programme.desc: No passado, uma feição geológica nas profundezas da água despertou uma pira que estava extinta há milhões de anos. Depois de atacar o lago em uma cidade tranquila, os terríveis animais invadem um parque aquático no meio da temporada de verão.

programme.title: Terremoto
programme.desc: Quando uma série de terremotos começa a destruir Los Angeles, Emily e Jason correm pelas ruínas da cidade na esperança de desviar o epicentro para salvar milhões de vidas.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite
programme.desc: Selene, uma guerreira vampira, está imersa em um conflito entre vampiros e lobisomens, enquanto se apaixona por Michael, um humano que é procurado por lobisomens por razões desconhecidas.

programme.title: Redenção
programme.desc: Jason Statham é um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grávida.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo é um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vítima de suas armadilhas é o inspetor de polícia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que são brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingança Explosiva
programme.desc: Ruslan Drachev é um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experiências. Ao visitar sua família ele descobre que sua filha está casando com o filho de um arqui-inimigo do mundo do crime.

programme.title: Massacre no Bairro Chinês
programme.desc: Jackie Chan faz o papel de um fugitivo do Japão que se torna um assassino para a máfia. O longa é focado na vida de imigrantes chineses que vivem no Japão.

programme.title: Longe de Casa
programme.desc: Um ex-jogador problemático da Major League Baseball volta para casa para confrontar seu padrasto abusivo.

programme.title: Máscara Negra
programme.desc: O sobrevivente de um projeto para criar super soldados deve lutar contra seus ex-companheiros como um herói mascarado.

programme.title: Batalha dos Impérios
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legião de mil soldados no país e com o comandante do protetorado das Regiões Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: A Espada do Imortal
programme.desc: Manji é um samurai altamente qualificado que torna-se amaldiçoado com a imortalidade após uma lendária batalha. Ele decide ajudar uma jovem que está movida pelo ódio e pela sede de vingança.

programme.title: Tudo por um Furo
programme.desc: A espera acabou! Ron Burgundy está de volta! Depois de perder o emprego, Ron reúne a equipe de notícias e enfrenta um novo rival

programme.title: A Família
programme.desc: Um chefe da máfia e sua família são transferidos para uma pacata cidade na França sob o programa de proteção a testemunhas depois de delatar a máfia.

programme.title: Caindo na Estrada 2: O Jogo da Cerveja
